00031 /* 
00032  * Trim chTarget from the left of string s.
00033  */
00034 void StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(std::string& s, char chTarget)
00035 {
00036         std::string::size_type n = s.find_first_not_of( chTarget );
00037         if( n == std::string::npos )
00038                 return;
00039         s = s.substr( n );
00040 }
00041 
00042 /* 
00043  * Trim space characters (' ') from the left of string s.
00044  */
00045 void StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(std::string& s)
00046 {
00047         STLTrimLeft( s, ' ' );
00048 }
00049 
00050 /* 
00051  * Trim chTarget from the right of string s.
00052  */
00053 void StringUtils::STLTrimRight(std::string& s, char chTarget)
00054 {
00055         std::string::size_type n = s.find_last_not_of( chTarget );
00056         if( n == std::string::npos )
00057                 s.clear();
00058         else
00059                 s = s.substr( 0, n+1 );
00060 }
00061 
00062 /* 
00063  * Trim space characters (' ') from the right of string s.
00064  */
00065 void StringUtils::STLTrimRight(std::string& s)
00066 {
00067         STLTrimRight( s, ' ' );
00068 }
00069 
00070 /* 
00071  * Trim chTarget from the left of string s.
00072  */
00073 void StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(std::wstring& s, wchar_t chTarget)
00074 {
00075         std::wstring::size_type n = s.find_first_not_of( chTarget );
00076         if( n == std::wstring::npos )
00077                 return;
00078         s = s.substr( n );
00079 }

00081 /* 
00082  * Trim space characters (' ') from the left of string s.
00083  */
00084 void StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(std::wstring& s)
00085 {
00086         STLTrimLeft( s, ' ' );
00087 }

00092 void StringUtils::STLTrimRight(std::wstring& s, wchar_t chTarget)
00093 {
00094         std::wstring::size_type n = s.find_last_not_of( chTarget );
00095         if( n == std::wstring::npos )
00096                 s.clear();
00097         else
00098                 s = s.substr( 0, n+1 );
00099 }

00109 /* 
00110  * Convert wide character string to a multi-byte character string.
00111  */
00112 std::string StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(const std::wstring& source)
00113 {
00114         char* szSource = new char[ source.length()+1 ];
00115         wcstombs( szSource, source.c_str(), source.length()+1 );
00116         std::string result = szSource;
00117         delete [] szSource;
00118         return result;
00119 }
00120 
00121 /* 
00122  * Convert multi-byte character string to a wide character character string.
00123  */
00124 std::wstring StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(const std::string& source)
00125 {
00126         wchar_t* szSource = new wchar_t[ source.length()+1 ];
00127         mbstowcs( szSource, source.c_str(), source.length()+1 );
00128         std::wstring result = szSource;
00129         delete [] szSource;
00130         return result;
00131 }
00132 
00133 /*
00134  * Convert an integer to a string.
00135  */
00136 std::wstring StringUtils::ToString(int value, int digits, wchar_t fill)
00137 {
00138 #if defined(_GLIBCPP_USE_WCHAR_T) || defined(_GLIBCXX_USE_WCHAR_T) || defined(_MSC_VER)
00139         std::wostringstream str;
00140         str << std::setw(digits) << std::setfill(fill) << value;
00141         return str.str();
00142 #else
00143     throw "No implementation";
00144 #endif
00145 }
